CustomField.description: Determines the method used to generate the reciprocal relationship. Use List Setting to use custom settings by gender. Use Value Inversion to invert the type if appropriate ("Parent-Child" to "Child-Parent")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the method used to generate the reciprocal relationship. Use List Setting to use custom settings by gender. Use Value Inversion to invert the type if appropriate ("Parent-Child" to "Child-Parent")
CustomField.label: Reciprocal Method
